entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is fighting to keep a hold on his wand.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A figure who appears to Harry and asks him to take his body back to his parents.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, whose victims are closing in on him.

relationships.description: Cedric asks Harry to take his body back to his parents.
Voldemort's victims are closing in on him, shielding Harry from his gaze.
